frameDefinitions: This frame describes a situation in which the Agent puts the Theme into the Ground for the purpose of growing.
Generally without overall (translational) motion,  an Agent places a Theme at a location, the Goal, which is profiled.
A Speaker addresses an Audience on a particular Topic.
The Creator creates a new entity, the Created_entity, possibly out of Components.
These are words relating to filling containers and covering areas with some thing, things or substance, the Theme.
A Trajector is identified as occurring at the same time as some better-known Landmark.
frameExamples: He recently <t>planted</t> some old apple trees. INI
David <t>placed</t> his briefcase on the floor.
McNamara <t>addressed</t> congress on the state of affairs of the Department of Defense.
The Libyans were <t>generating</t> arms for export.
Lionel Hutz <t>coated</t> the wall with paint.
He tried to take care of that <t>on</t> his last visit .
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Agent</fen> plants the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<fen>Theme</fen> is the item planted by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The <fen>Ground</fen> is the background or context to which the <fen>Agent</fen> pays attention in his agricultural efforts.
When the planting event occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Agent</fen> plants the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person (or other force) that causes the <fen>Theme</fen> to move.
The <fen>Theme</fen> is the object that changes location during the Placing.
The role <fen>Goal</fen> is the location where the <fen>Theme</fen> ends up. This role is profiled by words in this frame.
<fen>Time</fen> is when the Placing occurs
The <fen>Place</fen> indicates where the Placing occurs.
The person or persons to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> delivers their text.
The person who orally delivers a text about a <fen>Topic</fen> to a passive <fen>Audience</fen>.
What the text that the <fen>Speaker</fen> produces is about.
The <fen>Time</fen> describes when the speaking occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> describes the location where the speaking occurs.
The Creator creates a created entity.
This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the actor who instigates the filling.
The <fen>Theme</fen> is the physical object or substance which changes location.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is the area or container being filled. Goal is generally the NP Object in this frame.
An event which brings about the filling of the <fen>Goal</fen>.
When the filling occurs.
Where the filling takes place.
The entity that occurs at some time.
The event which designates the time at which a trajector occurs.
The period that occurs with respect to some other time.
The period in which a trajector takes place.  This period can be cyclical and, in that case, is interpreted contextually.
The event that occurs at some time.
The entity which designates the time of some trajector.  Note: this role is infrequent or non-existent in English and is included for completeness.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The waiter</fex> placed the food on the table.
The waiter placed <fex>the food</fex> on the table.
The waiter placed the food <fex>on the table</fex>.
Grass , which is sown with clover , provides rich pasture for cattle in summer and the clover is <fex>another plant which</fex> puts nitrogen into the soil .
Smithers had placed the table there <fex>the night before</fex>.
He lectured <fex>to the officers of the Scots Guard</fex>  in  1929.
<fex>You</fex> have to sermonize about the good times
He was the Director: he could lecture <fex>on whomever he liked</fex>.
Rev. Lovejoy carefully brushed the rolls <fex>with butter</fex>.
The current <fex>President of Georgia</fex> was born in Tbilisi.
During <fex>last night's walk</fex> , I stubbed my toe.
Future <fex>eras</fex> will be vastly changed from today.
I went to the store on <fex>Tuesday</fex>.
Currently, <fex>researchers are making new discoveries very quickly.</fex>
